name: Sugar and Napalm
description:
in order to save Professor Luigi from the Mafia, a duck-shaped blob must fight it's way through a constantly shifting dungeon. there's just one problem: it's ammo is also it's health! 

i've worked on this game for way too long, so i doubt i'll ever release an update. if it gets popular enough, i'll release the game's files for free. (or maybe you already can access them, idk how gdevelop works)

the intro song and title theme are both by patricia taxxon

the final dungeons theme is lacrimosa by mozart, covered by yours truly

manual because i didn't care to put the level names in the game:https://drive.google.com/file/d/1uOSR8wD8V-uSo-j5HH1i_Tg-pf46VtI1/view?usp=shari...

i wish gdevelop would allow me to export the game as an executable but its not working!!!!!!!!!!! maybe ill add it one day
